tool_description: Analyzes technical properties of multimedia files including dimensions, codecs, quality metrics, and media-specific metadata for audio, video, and image files.

file_path.description: Path to the media file to analyze

deep_codec_analysis.description: Perform detailed codec and compression analysis

error_messages: Unsupported media format: The file format is not recognized as a valid media file
Corrupted media file: The media file appears to be corrupted or incomplete
Codec not supported: The media file uses codecs not supported for analysis
Insufficient data: Media file lacks sufficient data for comprehensive analysis
usage: Specify file_path for basic media analysis, enable analyze_quality for quality metrics, extract_thumbnails for preview generation, and deep_codec_analysis for detailed technical information.

media_type.description: Type of media: image, audio, video

dimensions.description: Media dimensions in format 'widthxheight' for images/video

duration.description: Duration in seconds for audio/video files
